name: Baked Salmon 🥩
description: Salmon for one, please! This salmon recipe is hassle free with a delicious result and only requires a few ingredients. It's sure to become a weekly staple.
instructions: Cover a sheet pan with foil or parchment paper.
Drizzle olive oil on the salmon, then season with salt and pepper. Top with lemon slices and thyme.
Bake for 10-12 minutes. (The salmon should flake easily with a fork when it’s ready.)
